leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 计算系统生物学与动力学生态
leaf_cluster.typical_objects: ODE/PDE 模型, 代谢网络, 信号通路, 参数与不确定性
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→参数估计→仿真→敏感性/UQ→反演→验证
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 建模语言/仿真器 + 参数估计/UQ + 数据拟合工作流

unit.unit_name: AI4SysBio（替代模型/推断加速/闭环设计）

queries: [WEB] machine learning for ode parameter estimation github
[WEB] surrogate modeling for biological systems github
[WEB] simulation based inference tools biology github
[WEB] data driven differential equations biology github

tools.name: AMICI
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance sensitivity analysis for large ordinary differential equation models
tools.detailed_description: AMICI provides a multi-language (Python, C++, Matlab) interface for the SUNDIALS solvers CVODES (for ordinary differential equations) and IDAS (for algebraic differential equations). It is designed for efficient sensitivity analysis of large-scale models in systems biology.

tools.name: ClimODE
tools.one_line_profile: Climate and Weather Forecasting With Physics-informed Neural ODEs
tools.detailed_description: ClimODE is a model implementation that utilizes Physics-informed Neural Ordinary Differential Equations for climate and weather forecasting tasks, integrating physical laws with deep learning.

tools.name: BattMo.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulation of batteries in Julia
tools.detailed_description: BattMo.jl is a battery simulation tool written in Julia that leverages Jutul.jl for differentiable physics simulations, enabling optimization and parameter estimation for battery models.

tools.name: NeuralODE-ROM
tools.one_line_profile: Reduced-order Model for Fluid Flows via Neural ODEs
tools.detailed_description: A repository implementing Reduced-order Models (ROM) for fluid dynamics using Neural Ordinary Differential Equations, facilitating efficient simulation of complex flow dynamics.

tools.name: exponax
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Differentiable n-d PDE solvers in JAX
tools.detailed_description: Exponax provides efficient, differentiable solvers for n-dimensional Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) using JAX, suitable for physics-informed machine learning and gradient-based optimization.

tools.name: universal_differential_equations
tools.one_line_profile: Codebase for Universal Differential Equations for Scientific Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the reference implementation and examples for Universal Differential Equations (UDEs), a framework combining scientific models with machine learning to discover missing physics and dynamics.

tools.name: DiffSMat
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable scattering matrix computation for photonic devices
tools.detailed_description: DiffSMat is a C++ library for differentiable scattering matrix computations, enabling the inverse design and optimization of photonic devices through gradient-based methods.

tools.name: StiffNeuralODE
tools.one_line_profile: Stiff Neural Ordinary Differential Equations solver
tools.detailed_description: Implements methods for training Neural ODEs on stiff systems, addressing stability and performance issues common in chemical and biological kinetics modeling.

tools.name: reactorch
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Reacting Flow Simulation Package in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: Reactorch is a differentiable simulation package for chemically reacting flows, implemented in PyTorch to facilitate machine learning integration and sensitivity analysis in combustion and chemical engineering.

tools.name: neural-odes-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Neural ODEs for Semantic Segmentation in Pathology
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model implementation applying Neural ODEs to the semantic segmentation of colon glands in medical imaging, demonstrating the utility of continuous-depth models in biomedical image analysis.

tools.name: sbi_lens
tools.one_line_profile: Weak Lensing Implicit Inference with Differentiable Simulator
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for performing Simulation-Based Inference (SBI) in cosmology, specifically for weak lensing, utilizing differentiable simulators for gradient-based inference.

tools.name: MARBLE
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven representation of non-linear dynamics over manifolds
tools.detailed_description: MARBLE is a package for learning representations of non-linear dynamical systems on manifolds using statistical distributions of local phase portrait features, applicable to neural and physical systems.

tools.name: JSD-SBI
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Sequential Bayesian Inference in uncertain nonlinear dynamic systems
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox designed for performing Sequential Bayesian Inference (SBI) on uncertain nonlinear dynamic systems, facilitating parameter estimation and uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: augmented-neural-odes
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Augmented Neural ODEs
tools.detailed_description: A widely used implementation of Augmented Neural ODEs, which improves the expressivity and stability of standard Neural ODEs by augmenting the state space.

tools.name: Enzyme
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance automatic differentiation of LLVM and MLIR
tools.detailed_description: Enzyme is a compiler plugin that performs automatic differentiation (AD) on LLVM IR, enabling high-performance gradient computation for scientific codes written in languages like C, C++, Rust, and Julia.

tools.name: PD-NJODE
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Path-dependent Neural Jump ODEs
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation for Path-dependent Neural Jump ODEs, a class of neural differential equations capable of modeling systems with jumps and path dependencies.

tools.name: JAX-GalSim
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable galaxy image simulations in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX port of the GalSim library, enabling GPU-accelerated and differentiable simulations of galaxy images for astronomical research and analysis.

tools.name: ThinShellLab
tools.one_line_profile: Thin-shell Object Manipulations with Differentiable Physics Simulations
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics simulation framework specifically designed for thin-shell object manipulations, useful for robotic learning and physical modeling.

tools.name: D.VA
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerating Visual-Policy Learning through Parallel Differentiable Simulation
tools.detailed_description: D.VA is a framework for parallel differentiable simulation, designed to accelerate the learning of visual policies in robotics and physical systems.

tools.name: fiddy
tools.one_line_profile: Finite difference methods library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for computing finite differences, often used as a backend for gradient approximation in parameter estimation workflows within the ICB-DCM ecosystem.

tools.name: parPE
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter estimation for dynamical models using high-performance computing
tools.detailed_description: parPE is a C++ library and tool for scalable parameter estimation of dynamical systems (ODEs) using MPI for parallelization, designed for large-scale systems biology models.

tools.name: pyPESTO
tools.one_line_profile: Python Parameter EStimation TOolbox
tools.detailed_description: pyPESTO is a widely used Python toolbox for parameter estimation, sensitivity analysis, and uncertainty quantification of biological models, supporting various backends like AMICI.

tools.name: clarify
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-Based Inference for Regression Models
tools.detailed_description: Clarify is a software package for simulation-based inference, allowing researchers to interpret statistical models by simulating quantities of interest and their uncertainties.

tools.name: SATA
tools.one_line_profile: Energy simulation framework for BPTT-based SNN inference and training
tools.detailed_description: SATA is a simulation framework designed to estimate the energy consumption and performance of Spiking Neural Networks (SNNs) trained with Backpropagation Through Time (BPTT).

tools.name: Twin4Build
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic simulation of buildings with differentiable data-driven models
tools.detailed_description: Twin4Build is a simulation tool for building energy modeling that integrates differentiable data-driven models with semantic information, enabling digital twin applications.

tools.name: Catalax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based framework to model biological systems
tools.detailed_description: Catalax is a JAX-based framework designed for modeling biological systems, leveraging JAX's composable transformations for efficient simulation and analysis.

tools.name: UniversalDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Universal differential equations for ecologists
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing Universal Differential Equations specifically tailored for ecological modeling, allowing the combination of mechanistic models with neural networks.

tools.name: AstroNbodySim.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Unitful and differentiable gravitational N-body simulation code
tools.detailed_description: AstroNbodySim.jl is a Julia package for gravitational N-body simulations that supports physical units and automatic differentiation, suitable for astrophysical research.

tools.name: MathepiaModels.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Epidemic spatial and temporal model setup and simulation library
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for setting up and simulating state-of-the-art epidemiology models, including universal differential equations and epidemiology-informed deep learning models.

tools.name: ASiM
tools.one_line_profile: Inference simulation framework for SRAM-based Analog CiM circuits
tools.detailed_description: A framework for modeling and analyzing the inference accuracy of SRAM-based Analog Compute-in-Memory (CiM) circuits.

tools.name: MLE4LTI
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter estimation for Linear Time-Invariant Systems
tools.detailed_description: Implements Maximum Likelihood and Prediction Error Methods for estimating parameters in Linear Time-Invariant (LTI) systems.

tools.name: torchoptics
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable wave optics simulation library
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable wave optics simulation library built on PyTorch, enabling gradient-based optimization of optical systems.

tools.name: WarpDiffRobot
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulation framework for robot-object interactions
tools.detailed_description: A framework that calibrates object properties through differentiable simulations of robot-object interactions.

tools.name: DiffRL
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics simulation for reinforcement learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework for accelerated policy learning using parallel differentiable simulation, enabling efficient reinforcement learning in physical environments.

tools.name: neurodiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network solver for differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A library for solving ordinary and partial differential equations (ODEs/PDEs) using neural networks based on PyTorch.

tools.name: SphereUDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Differential Equations for regression on the sphere
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for performing regression analysis on spherical data using Universal Differential Equations (UDEs).

tools.name: deepmaps
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell biological network inference tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for inferring single-cell biological networks using a heterogeneous graph transformer approach.

tools.name: peregrine
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based inference library for gravitational waves
tools.detailed_description: A simulation-based inference (SBI) library designed to perform analysis on a wide class of gravitational wave signals.

tools.name: saqqara
tools.one_line_profile: SBI library for stochastic gravitational wave backgrounds
tools.detailed_description: A simulation-based inference (SBI) library designed specifically for analyzing stochastic gravitational wave background data.

tools.name: calisim
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for calibration and evaluation of simulation models
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox designed to assist in the calibration and evaluation of various simulation models.

tools.name: PHOENIX
tools.one_line_profile: Biologically informed NeuralODE inference tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to infer biologically informed NeuralODEs describing genome-wide regulatory dynamics.

tools.name: DataDrivenDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Automated discovery of dynamical systems
tools.detailed_description: A library for data-driven modeling and automated discovery of dynamical systems, part of the SciML ecosystem.

tools.name: DiffEqFlux.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: Provides pre-built implicit layer architectures, stiff/non-stiff DE solvers, and tools for physics-informed machine learning.

tools.name: DiffEqParamEstim.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter estimation for differential equations
tools.detailed_description: A library for scientific machine learning (SciML) parameter estimation with pre-built loss functions.

tools.name: ModelingToolkitNeuralNets.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Symbolic-Numeric Neural DAEs and UDEs
tools.detailed_description: A library for automating Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) using Symbolic-Numeric Neural DAEs and Universal Differential Equations.

tools.name: NeuralPDE.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINN) solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINN) solvers for partial differential equations, accelerating scientific simulation.

tools.name: OrdinaryDiffEq.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance ODE and DAE solvers
tools.detailed_description: A library containing high-performance solvers for ordinary differential equations (ODEs) and differential-algebraic equations (DAEs), supporting neural ODEs.

tools.name: Surrogates.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Surrogate modeling and optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for surrogate modeling and optimization, designed for scientific machine learning applications.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: 2D fracture simulation using Extended Finite Element Method
tools.detailed_description: A Matlab program for solving fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in a 2D linear-elastic solid using XFEM.

tools.name: diff-hybrid-traffic-sim
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable hybrid traffic simulation
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable hybrid traffic simulation tool, enabling gradient-based optimization for traffic engineering.

tools.name: JAX-CPFEM
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable crystal plasticity finite element simulation
tools.detailed_description: Efficient GPU-computing simulation for differentiable crystal plasticity finite element method (CPFEM) using JAX.

tools.name: PDMD
tools.one_line_profile: Potential-free Data-driven Molecular Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A repository for Potential-free Data-driven Molecular Dynamics (PDMD), providing tools for molecular simulation without explicit potential functions.

tools.name: GNN-Fluid-Sim
tools.one_line_profile: GNN-based fluid simulation model
tools.detailed_description: A full implementation of a Graph Neural Network (GNN)-based fluid simulation model, offering a data-driven alternative to traditional CFD.

tools.name: diff_fem
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulation of soft multi-body systems
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics simulator for soft multi-body systems using the Finite Element Method (FEM), enabling gradient-based optimization for control and design tasks.

tools.name: diffarticulated
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient differentiable simulation of articulated bodies
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine specifically designed for articulated bodies, supporting efficient gradient computation for robotics and control applications.

tools.name: Inferix
tools.one_line_profile: Block-diffusion based inference engine for world simulation
tools.detailed_description: A next-generation inference engine designed for world simulation, utilizing block-diffusion methods to enable efficient and scalable simulation inference.

tools.name: jaxsim
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics engine and multibody dynamics library
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine and multibody dynamics library built with JAX, designed for control and robot learning applications.

tools.name: Anode
tools.one_line_profile: Memory-efficient gradients for Neural ODEs
tools.detailed_description: A framework providing unconditionally accurate and memory-efficient gradient computation for Neural Ordinary Differential Equations (Neural ODEs).

tools.name: PyDEns
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for solving ODEs and PDEs using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for solving Ordinary and Partial Differential Equations (ODEs & PDEs) using neural networks, enabling mesh-free solutions.

tools.name: 3dpredictsim
tools.one_line_profile: 3D muscle-driven predictive simulations of human movement
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating 3D muscle-driven predictive simulations of human movement using direct collocation and algorithmic differentiation.

tools.name: cytopath
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based inference of differentiation trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A tool for simulation-based inference of differentiation trajectories from RNA velocity fields in single-cell data.

tools.name: XLuminA
tools.one_line_profile: Auto-differentiating discovery framework for super-resolution microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A highly-efficient, auto-differentiating discovery framework designed for optimizing super-resolution microscopy setups.

tools.name: QNODE
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum dynamics latent neural ODE
tools.detailed_description: A tool for modeling quantum dynamics using latent neural ordinary differential equations.

tools.name: AMICI (ST)
tools.one_line_profile: Cell-cell interaction inference from spatial transcriptomics
tools.detailed_description: A cross-attention-based tool for inferring cell-cell interactions from spatial transcriptomics (ST) data.

tools.name: SimulationBasedInference.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for simulation-based inference in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A flexible toolkit for performing simulation-based inference (SBI) using the Julia programming language.

tools.name: predictionet
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic network inference combining data and priors
tools.detailed_description: A package for inferring biological networks by combining genomic data with prior information from literature and databases.

tools.name: epower
tools.one_line_profile: Power analysis for environmental sampling designs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for conducting power analysis on beyond-BACI sampling designs through INLA-based inference and Monte Carlo simulation.

tools.name: demografr
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based inference in evolutionary biology
tools.detailed_description: A framework for performing simulation-based inference specifically for evolutionary biology and demographic modeling.

tools.name: ODE2VAE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep generative second order ODEs with Bayesian neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A deep generative model framework that combines second-order Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs) with Variational Autoencoders (VAEs) for modeling high-dimensional sequential data.

tools.name: pnode
tools.one_line_profile: Library for training neural ODEs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to facilitate the training and implementation of Neural Ordinary Differential Equations.

tools.name: KiMONo
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-omics network inference tool
tools.detailed_description: A network inference tool for multi-omics datasets that uses sparse-group-LASSO regression and incorporates prior biological information.

tools.name: RNODE
tools.one_line_profile: Regularized Neural ODEs
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Regularized Neural ODEs (RNODE), improving the training stability and performance of continuous-depth models.

tools.name: DISCO-DJ
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Simulations for Cosmology with Jax
tools.detailed_description: A framework for differentiable cosmological simulations implemented in JAX, enabling gradient-based inference and optimization in cosmology.

tools.name: NDP
tools.one_line_profile: Neural ODE Processes
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Neural ODE Processes, a class of stochastic processes governed by Neural ODEs, useful for modeling time-series data.

tools.name: falcon
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed dynamic simulation-based inference
tools.detailed_description: A tool for distributed dynamic simulation-based inference, facilitating scalable inference tasks involving complex simulations.

tools.name: ClimODE
tools.one_line_profile: Climate Forecasting With Physics-informed Neural ODEs
tools.detailed_description: A physics-informed Neural ODE model designed for climate forecasting, integrating physical laws with deep learning for weather prediction.

tools.name: evoxels
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics framework for voxel-based microstructure simulations
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics framework for simulating voxel-based microstructures, enabling optimization of material properties and structures.

tools.name: SIXSA
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation based Inference for X-ray Spectral Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing simulation-based inference specifically for X-ray spectral analysis.

tools.name: Updes
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Partial Differential Equations Simulator
tools.detailed_description: A universal simulator for Partial Differential Equations (PDEs), providing a flexible framework for solving various physical systems.

tools.name: cheetah
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and differentiable particle accelerator optics simulation
tools.detailed_description: A fast and differentiable simulation tool for particle accelerator optics, designed for reinforcement learning and optimization applications.

tools.name: sbijax
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based inference in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing simulation-based inference (SBI) using JAX, leveraging its automatic differentiation and compilation capabilities.

tools.name: thz-tds-mle
tools.one_line_profile: Parameter estimation for terahertz time-domain spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A tool for maximum-likelihood parameter estimation in terahertz time-domain spectroscopy.

tools.name: Dojo.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable physics engine for robotics
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine written in Julia, designed for robotics simulation and control.

tools.name: HydroGym
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable RL environment for fluid dynamics modeling and control
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library of differentiable fluid dynamics solvers designed for reinforcement learning (RL) and optimization. It provides a suite of benchmark problems for data-driven modeling and control of fluid flows, leveraging differentiable physics to accelerate training and analysis.

tools.name: PySINDy
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse identification of nonlinear dynamical systems from data
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for the Sparse Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics (SINDy) method. It enables researchers to discover governing dynamical system equations (ODEs/PDEs) from measurement data by enforcing sparsity in the candidate library of functions.

tools.name: dynamiqs
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance differentiable quantum systems simulation with JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based library for simulating open and closed quantum systems. It leverages GPU acceleration and automatic differentiation to enable gradient-based optimization for quantum control and dynamics problems.

tools.name: TactileSimulation
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable tactile simulation for robotic manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A simulation framework that provides efficient and differentiable tactile feedback for robotic manipulation tasks. It allows for the optimization of control policies by simulating the physical interaction and tactile sensing processes.

tools.name: pmwd
tools.one_line_profile: Particle-Mesh code for cosmological N-body simulations with derivatives
tools.detailed_description: A fully differentiable cosmological particle-mesh N-body simulator. It enables gradient-based inference of cosmological parameters and initial conditions from observational data by backpropagating through the forward simulation.

tools.name: Data Driven Dynamics
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven dynamics modeling framework for aerial vehicles
tools.detailed_description: A framework for modeling the dynamics of aerial vehicles (like quadrotors) using data-driven approaches. It supports system identification and model learning tasks to improve control performance.

tools.name: DiffAvatar
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulation for garment optimization and avatar reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing differentiable physics simulation to optimize garment parameters and reconstruct 3D avatars from data. It bridges computer graphics and physical simulation for realistic clothing modeling.

tools.name: ceviche
tools.one_line_profile: Electromagnetic simulation with automatic differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for simulating electromagnetic fields using Finite-Difference Time-Domain (FDTD) and Frequency-Domain (FDFD) methods. It supports automatic differentiation, enabling inverse design and optimization of photonic devices.

tools.name: diffaero
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated differentiable simulation for quadrotor aerodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulation framework designed for efficient policy learning in quadrotors. It models aerodynamic effects and allows gradients to propagate through the physics engine for reinforcement learning applications.

tools.name: Differentiable Atomistic Potentials
tools.one_line_profile: Automatically differentiable potentials for molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A library for defining and using atomistic potentials that are automatically differentiable. This facilitates the training of machine learning potentials and the calculation of forces and stress tensors in molecular simulations.

tools.name: gradsim
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulation for system identification and visuomotor control
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine and rendering framework focused on system identification and visuomotor control tasks. It allows for the recovery of physical parameters from video data through gradient descent.

tools.name: noa
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable programming algorithms and framework in C++
tools.detailed_description: A modern C++ library for differentiable programming, enabling gradient-based optimization and learning within high-performance C++ applications. It serves as a foundational tool for building differentiable scientific simulations.

tools.name: sbiax
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight and parallelized simulation-based inference in JAX
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based library for Simulation-Based Inference (SBI), offering fast and parallelized implementations of inference algorithms like NPE (Neural Posterior Estimation). It is designed to accelerate parameter estimation for complex scientific models.

tools.name: PySINDy GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical User Interface for PySINDy
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface wrapper for the PySINDy library, making the sparse identification of nonlinear dynamics accessible to users without extensive coding experience. It facilitates data loading, parameter tuning, and model visualization.

tools.name: SuperGrad
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulation of superconducting quantum processors
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for the differentiable simulation of superconducting quantum circuits. It enables pulse shaping and parameter optimization for quantum processors by providing gradients through the simulation dynamics.

tools.name: easy-neural-ode
tools.one_line_profile: Library for learning differential equations that are easy to solve
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing methods to learn Neural ODEs with regularization terms that encourage the learned dynamics to be computationally efficient to solve. It serves as a practical tool for training faster and more stable Neural ODE models.

tools.name: Jaxley
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable biophysical neuron simulations on CPU/GPU/TPU
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable simulator for biophysically detailed neuron models using JAX. It allows for automatic differentiation of neuron dynamics, enabling gradient-based parameter estimation and optimization of neuronal properties.

tools.name: DiffeRT
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Ray Tracing Toolbox for Radio Propagation
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for differentiable ray tracing, specifically designed for radio propagation simulations. It enables the optimization of transmitter locations or environment parameters by backpropagating through the ray tracing process.

tools.name: BINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Biologically-informed neural networks implementation
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Biologically-Informed Neural Networks (BINNs), which integrate biological knowledge (like sparse network structures) into neural network architectures for interpretable modeling of biological systems.

tools.name: sbi4abm
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box Bayesian inference for agent-based models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for performing Simulation-Based Inference (SBI) on Agent-Based Models (ABMs). It provides interfaces to apply likelihood-free inference methods to complex, stochastic ABMs commonly used in ecology and social sciences.

tools.name: GRGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Regulatory Graph Neural Networks for network inference
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network (GNN) based framework for inferring gene regulatory networks from gene expression data. It utilizes the inductive capability of GNNs to predict regulatory relationships between genes.

tools.name: torch_ACA
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Checkpoint Adjoint method for Neural ODE gradient estimation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library implementing the Adaptive Checkpoint Adjoint (ACA) method. It improves the accuracy and stability of gradient estimation in Neural ODEs compared to standard adjoint methods, serving as a robust solver component.

tools.name: GNE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for gene network inference
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed to infer gene regulatory networks by aggregating various biological information sources. It provides a pipeline for processing expression data and predicting gene-gene interactions.

tools.name: sbied
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based Inference for Epidemiological Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A package for performing simulation-based inference specifically on epidemiological models. It helps researchers estimate parameters of disease spread models using observed data and likelihood-free inference techniques.

tools.name: rude
tools.one_line_profile: Rheological Universal Differential Equations for complex fluids
tools.detailed_description: A scientific machine learning library for modeling complex fluids using Rheological Universal Differential Equations. It combines physics-based rheological models with neural networks to capture non-Newtonian fluid behavior.

tools.name: JAXtronomy
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated differentiable gravitational lensing simulation
tools.detailed_description: A JAX port of the lenstronomy package, enabling parallelized, GPU-accelerated, and differentiable simulations of gravitational lensing. It is used for modeling strong lensing systems and inferring mass distributions.

tools.name: SBINN
tools.one_line_profile: Systems-biology-informed neural networks for parameter identification
tools.detailed_description: A framework for identifiability analysis and parameter identification in systems biology models using physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) tailored for biological dynamics.

tools.name: pySINDy
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics (SINDy) algorithm implementation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the Sparse Identification of Nonlinear Dynamics (SINDy) method, enabling the discovery of governing dynamical systems equations from data.

tools.name: delfi
tools.one_line_profile: Density estimation likelihood-free inference toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for density estimation likelihood-free inference (DELFI), used for simulation-based inference in neuroscience and systems biology (predecessor to sbi).

tools.name: GATSBI
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Adversarial Training for Simulation-Based Inference
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) for performing simulation-based inference, allowing for efficient parameter estimation in complex models.

tools.name: Simformer
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer and diffusion model based simulation-based inference
tools.detailed_description: A flexible all-in-one simulation-based inference framework combining transformers and diffusion models to handle complex posterior distributions.

tools.name: PINA
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-Informed Neural networks for Advanced modeling
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing an intuitive interface for Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) to solve differential equations and model physical systems.

tools.name: Differentiable Simulation AM
tools.one_line_profile: Optimization tool for additive manufacturing using automatic differentiation
tools.detailed_description: An optimization framework leveraging automatic differentiation for simulation and process optimization in additive manufacturing contexts.

tools.name: Hypothesis
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for simulation-based inference and mechanization of science
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for simulation-based inference (SBI), providing algorithms for likelihood-free inference and scientific hypothesis testing.

tools.name: DIMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Molecular Simulator framework
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based framework for machine-learning enhanced differentiable molecular simulations, enabling gradient-based optimization of molecular parameters.

tools.name: DiffCloth
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable cloth simulation with dry frictional contact
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics engine specifically for cloth simulation, supporting gradient-based optimization for physical parameters and control.

tools.name: AeroSandbox
tools.one_line_profile: Aircraft design optimization via automatic differentiation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for aircraft design optimization that leverages automatic differentiation for fast and accurate aerodynamic, propulsion, and structural analysis.

tools.name: VMAS
tools.one_line_profile: Vectorized Multi-Agent Simulator
tools.detailed_description: A vectorized, differentiable physics simulator designed for efficient multi-agent reinforcement learning benchmarking and simulation.

tools.name: CGDMS
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable molecular simulation of proteins
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable molecular simulation tool for proteins using a coarse-grained potential, enabling gradient-based optimization of molecular structures.

tools.name: Rewarped
tools.one_line_profile: Reinforcement learning in differentiable multiphysics simulation
tools.detailed_description: A framework for reinforcement learning within differentiable multiphysics simulations, built on NVIDIA Warp.

tools.name: torchdiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable ODE solvers with GPU support
tools.detailed_description: A library providing differentiable ordinary differential equation (ODE) solvers implemented in PyTorch, enabling the integration of ODEs into neural network architectures (Neural ODEs).

tools.name: NeuralLaplace
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Laplace Reconstructions for modeling time-series dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Neural Laplace, a method for learning diverse differential equation environments using Laplace reconstructions. It offers O(1) complexity for modeling time observations and serves as an alternative to Neural ODEs for modeling complex dynamics.

tools.name: CellBox
tools.one_line_profile: Interpretable machine learning for perturbation biology
tools.detailed_description: A framework for modeling cellular responses to perturbations using an interpretable machine learning approach. It combines ODE models with neural networks to infer interaction networks and predict system behavior under drug or genetic perturbations.

tools.name: sbibm
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for simulation-based inference algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking suite for simulation-based inference (SBI) methods. It provides a collection of reference tasks, metrics, and utilities to evaluate and compare the performance of different SBI algorithms systematically.

tools.name: sbi
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for simulation-based inference (likelihood-free inference)
tools.detailed_description: A standard library for simulation-based inference (SBI), enabling parameter estimation for complex simulators where the likelihood is intractable. It implements state-of-the-art neural inference methods (SNPE, SNLE, SNRE) to perform Bayesian inference.

tools.name: QTensorAI
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid quantum-classical neural network simulation platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform for simulating hybrid quantum-classical neural networks using tensor networks. It leverages QTensor for efficient quantum circuit simulation and integrates with PyTorch for differentiable training of hybrid models.

tools.name: socialforce
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable Social Force simulation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing the Social Force Model for simulating particle or agent dynamics. It is fully differentiable, allowing for parameter optimization and integration into machine learning pipelines for analyzing crowd dynamics or biological cell migration.

tools.name: paltas
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based inference pipeline for strong gravitational lensing
tools.detailed_description: A software package designed to conduct simulation-based inference on strong gravitational lensing systems. It generates realistic lensing simulations and trains neural posterior estimators to infer lens parameters from observational data.

tools.name: MarineHydro.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable boundary element simulations for hydrodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for performing differentiable boundary element method (BEM) simulations. It is designed for the design and optimization of offshore structures by simulating wave-structure interactions.

tools.name: synference
tools.one_line_profile: SBI-based Spectral Energy Distribution (SED) fitting tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for flexible Spectral Energy Distribution (SED) fitting in astronomy, powered by simulation-based inference. It integrates with the Synthesizer framework to infer physical properties of galaxies from photometric data.

tools.name: RoboDojo.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable simulator for robotic systems
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable physics simulator written in Julia, designed for robotic systems. It enables gradient-based optimization for control and dynamics learning tasks.

tools.name: jwave
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based differentiable acoustic simulation framework
tools.detailed_description: A research framework for differentiable and parallelizable acoustic simulations using JAX. It supports execution on CPUs, GPUs, and TPUs, enabling efficient forward modeling and inversion for acoustic problems.

tools.name: harissa
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation and inference of gene regulatory networks
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the simulation and inference of gene regulatory networks (GRNs) based on a mechanistic model of transcriptional bursting. It allows for generating realistic single-cell gene expression data and inferring network structures from data.

tools.name: CIE-R-Package
tools.one_line_profile: Causal Inference and Directional Enrichment for biological networks
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing methods for causal inference and directional enrichment analysis on biological networks. It helps in identifying active pathways and regulatory mechanisms from omics data.

tools.name: albatross
tools.one_line_profile: SBI library for stellar stream analysis
tools.detailed_description: A simulation-based inference library specifically designed for analyzing stellar streams in the Milky Way. It facilitates the estimation of potential parameters and stream properties using likelihood-free methods.

tools.name: peregrine
tools.one_line_profile: SBI library for gravitational wave signal analysis
tools.detailed_description: A simulation-based inference library designed to perform analysis on a wide class of gravitational wave signals. It enables efficient parameter estimation for gravitational wave astronomy.

tools.name: swyft
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable system for scientific simulation-based inference
tools.detailed_description: A library for efficient simulation-based inference, implementing Truncated Marginal Neural Ratio Estimation (TMNRE). It is designed to scale to complex scientific simulators and high-dimensional parameter spaces, widely used in cosmology and physics.

tools.name: marginaleffects
tools.one_line_profile: R package for model interpretation and marginal effects
tools.detailed_description: An R package to compute and plot predictions, slopes, marginal means, and comparisons for various statistical and ML models. It supports uncertainty estimation via delta method, bootstrapping, and simulation-based inference, making it a powerful tool for statistical analysis in science.

tools.name: sbi_pp
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation-based inference customized for astronomical applications
tools.detailed_description: A library providing simulation-based inference tools tailored for astronomical tasks, such as photometric redshift estimation. It builds upon standard SBI methods to address domain-specific challenges in astronomy.

tools.name: diff-surfel-tracing
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable 2D Gaussian ray tracer
tools.detailed_description: A fully differentiable 2D Gaussian ray tracer built on OptiX. It supports multiple-bounce path tracing for complex light transport simulation and is designed for integration into optimization and inverse rendering tasks.

tools.name: Py_PSNODE
tools.one_line_profile: Neural ODE and DAE modules for power system modeling
tools.detailed_description: A library providing general neural Ordinary Differential Equation (ODE) and Differential Algebraic Equation (DAE) modules specifically for power system dynamic modeling. It facilitates the integration of neural networks with physical power system models.

tools.name: APDTFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Time series forecasting framework using Neural ODEs
tools.detailed_description: A modular forecasting framework for time series data that leverages Neural ODEs, transformers, and probabilistic modeling. It allows researchers to experiment with and deploy advanced deep learning models for dynamic system forecasting.
